verse: Those who sanctify and purify themselves to enter the groves and follow the one in the center, consuming the flesh of pigs, vermin, and ratsâ€”they will all perish together, says the Lord, along with their deeds and their thoughts.
Glory among the Nations. I am coming to gather every nation and every language. They will come forth to behold my glory.

I will set a sign among them, and I will send some of their survivors to the nations: to Tarshish, Put and Lud, Mosoch, Tubal, and Javan, to the distant coasts and islands that have never heard of me or seen my glory.
